name: Lovi Poe
description:
'''Lourdes Virginia''' "'''Lovi'''" '''Moran Poe''' (born February 11, 1991) is a Filipino actress and recording artist. She is the daughter of action star [[Fernando Poe Jr.]]

Poe is known for starring in two popular drama series on the [[GMA Network (company)|GMA Network]]: ''[[Bakekang]]'' (2006) as Kristal and ''[[Ang Dalawang Mrs. Real]]'' (2014) as Shiela. She received her first Best Actress award in the [[6th Cinemalaya Independent Film Festival|2010 Cinemalaya Independent Film Festival]] for the film ''Mayohan'', where she played Lilibeth. That same year, she was also a [[FAMAS Award for Best Actress|FAMAS Best Actress]] awardee for the film ''Sagrada Familia'' for playing Kath Asero.

On September 16, 2021, Poe signed with [[ABS-CBN]]. In 2023, she founded the film production company [[C'est Lovi Productions]].
